cta.title: Ready to let your audience tell you what to create?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators already using Fanlist to create content their audience actually wants to see
cta.finalSubtitle: Join thousands of creators already using Fanlist

hero.title: Create content your audience actually wants to see
hero.subtitle: Fanlist lets you receive ideas, suggestions and votes directly from your followers
hero.tagline: Connect with your audience like never before

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to validate and develop your ideas

leaderboards.description: Visualize your ideas' progress with real-time rankings

suggestions.title: Community Suggestions

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Understand your community's trends and preferences

customization.title: Complete Customization
customization.description: Adapt the platform to match your brand

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share your rankings with custom public links

showcase.title: Data-driven decisions for your content
showcase.description: Know exactly what your audience wants to see and create content that resonates with them, generating more engagement and growth for your personal brand.
showcase.bullet1: Higher audience engagement with interactive voting
showcase.bullet2: Real-time data on your followers' preferences
showcase.bullet3: Complete customization to match your brand

step1.title: Create your Fanlist
step1.description: Set up your profile and add your first content ideas

step2.title: Share with your followers
step2.description: Send the link to your audience on social media and other channels

step3.title: Receive ideas and votes
step3.description: Your audience votes and suggests content they actually want to see

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Supercharge your content creation with real data

benefit1.title: Validate your ideas before recording
benefit1.description: Avoid creating content that doesn't interest and focus on what your audience really wants

benefit2.title: Increase engagement with your community
benefit2.description: Involve your community in the creative process and generate more interaction

benefit3.title: Get useful feedback without getting overwhelmed
benefit3.description: Organize all suggestions in one place, without losing valuable ideas

benefit4.title: Perfect for content creators
benefit4.description: Ideal for YouTubers, streamers, podcasters and any digital creator

pricing.title: Plans and Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your project

testimonials.subtitle: Discover how our users have transformed their ideas

testimonial1.quote: This platform revolutionized how we validate our product ideas.
testimonial1.author: Maria Gonzalez

testimonial2.quote: Community feedback helped us improve our concept before launch.
testimonial2.author: Carlos Ruiz

testimonial3.quote: An essential tool for any entrepreneur wanting to validate their ideas.
testimonial3.author: Ana Torres

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.registerCreatorDescription: Create your own idea ranking and connect with your audience
auth.registerAudienceDescription: Vote for your favorite creator's ideas and help them decide what to create next
auth.creatorRoleDescription: Share ideas and get feedback from your audience
auth.audienceRoleDescription: Vote for your favorite creator's ideas
auth.notCreatorAccountDesc: This is not a creator account. Please register as a creator if you want to use Fanlist's creator features.

common.alreadyVotedDesc: You have already voted for this idea
common.yourOpinionMatters: Your opinion matters to this creator

creator.voteSuccessDesc: Your vote has been registered successfully
creator.voteErrorDesc: Could not register your vote. Please try again.
creator.defaultProfileDescription: QA Engineer and content creator focused on software testing, automation, and quality control best practices.
creator.cantVoteOwnDesc: You can't vote on your own ideas üòÖ
creator.cantSuggestOwnDesc: You can't suggest ideas to your own profile üòÖ

suggestIdea.beFirstToSuggest: Be the first to suggest a content idea
suggestIdea.title: Suggest an Idea
suggestIdea.description: What would you like the creator to publish next?
suggestIdea.loginRequiredDesc: You need an account to suggest ideas to this creator.
suggestIdea.thankYouDesc: Your idea has been sent to the creator for approval.
suggestIdea.errorDesc: An error occurred while sending your suggestion
suggestIdea.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters
suggestIdea.titleMaxLength: Title must be 100 characters or less
suggestIdea.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
suggestIdea.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be 500 characters or less
suggestIdea.achievementText: Your idea has been sent to @{{username}}!
suggestIdea.ideaSentDesc: The creator will review it soon. Thank you for your contribution!

ideas.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this idea? This action cannot be undone and all votes will be lost.
ideas.createFirstIdea: Create your first idea to get started
ideas.suggestedIdeasWillAppear: Suggested ideas from your audience will appear here
ideas.approvedSuccess: The idea has been approved successfully
ideas.approveErrorDesc: Could not approve the idea. Please try again.
ideas.rejectErrorDesc: Could not reject the idea. Please try again.

dashboard.voteDescription: This is what your audience is looking for üôåüèª
dashboard.shareProfileDesc: This link directs your followers to the public version of your profile, where they can view and vote on your content ideas.
dashboard.publicProfileVisibility: This page is visible to anyone with the link, even if they don't have an account on the platform.
dashboard.visitorVoting: Visitors can view your ideas and vote on them, helping you determine what content to create first.
dashboard.shareTip1: Share your link on social media to get more votes
dashboard.shareTip2: Include the link in your videos or posts description
dashboard.shareTip3: Encourage your audience to vote to influence your next content

ideaForm.addDescription: Share your idea with the community. Be clear and concise to get more votes!

csvImport.title: Import Ideas from CSV
csvImport.description: Upload a CSV file to import multiple ideas at once
csvImport.dragDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here, or click to select

template.title: Need a template?
template.description: Download a sample CSV file to get started

format.title: CSV Format:
format.description: Your CSV must have a 'title' column (required) and optionally a 'description' column. Title max 100 characters, description max 280 characters.

success.title: Ideas imported successfully
success.description: {{count}} ideas have been imported to your dashboard

proRequired.title: Pro Feature
proRequired.description: CSV import is available for Pro users only. Upgrade to access this feature.

trialExpired.description: Your free trial has expired. Upgrade to continue using CSV import.

premiumExpired.description: Your premium subscription has expired. Renew to continue using CSV import.
